title: Removes rogue ", includes,"
author: rachaelrenk
details: Removed the term "includes" from the list of default theme components (layouts, includes, stylesheets) in documentation.
Corrected the description of theme-provided assets to avoid implying "includes" as a distinct component.
summary:

- Corrected the description of theme-provided assets to avoid implying "includes" as a distinct component.

### Summary
- Removed the term "includes" from the list of default theme components (layouts, includes, stylesheets) in documentation.
- Corrected the description of theme-provided assets to avoid implying "includes" as a distinct component.
